develop_a_practice_partner.probleme: How to get a good practice partner?
develop_a_practice_partner.diagnostic: Difficulty finding someone at the same level or willing to train at the same times and number of hours.

debutant.description: Practice with a weaker player, focusing on consistency and accuracy. Keep the ball in their forehand and backhand pockets.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice with a weaker player, focusing on consistency and accuracy. Keep the ball in their forehand and backhand pockets.
